website_summaries.verdict: The backlit keyboard on the ProFolio+ might be worth the investment for some frequent travelers who've been feeling left in the dark.
pros: The ZAGGkeys ProFolio+ sports sturdy construction, compact design, and a multicolored LED backlit keyboard
cons: can't use case easily for non-keyboard use

customer_reviews.title: Made for ALL teens...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 15-year old teen son for his school, daily-use iPad...he had another "sturdy" case that lost keys and broke after 6 months...this one, so far after 6 months, work and still looks good - a couple of scratches, as expected, but in very good shape... Will recommend for teens....and adults that behave like teens...
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR ZAMORA

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product ever!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Run the other direction on this ZAGG product. I purchased it and it's complete junk. Not wearing well at all like my last ZAGG PROfolio plus now some of the keys aren't working. Completely a waste of nearly $100.00 I complained to the people I purchased it from and they wouldn't take a return, they stated I needed to contact ZAGG. So I did, and found out that ZAGG no longer makes these and they won't give me a refund because I didn't purchase through them. Nor do they make anything like this anymore. I was completely rip offed.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary A. Joles

customer_reviews.title: Buy this. Don’t buy anything else.
customer_reviews.text: The only keyboard case I will ever buy for my iPads. I bought the same brand for my iPad mini and I will not buy anything else. I made the mistake of buying a different brand at first because I didn’t see ZAGG for my iPad 4. The first one I bought was a cheap peace of plastic until I managed to search for this one. I absolutely love it. It’s just like a real keyboard and I can turn it on and off so I know that the battery is being saved. The backlighting is great. It pairs easily and stays connected even when I turn it on and off. I love this keyboard so much.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This Zagg keyboard case has one problem that I have encountered before. Namely when opening (not wrenching) the keyboard case the "Screenholder" AKA tablet holder on this case snapped off. Before this happened I was very happy with my purchase. The keyboard is very close to the feel of a laptop keyboard and I loved the backlit keys. I had purchased an identical Zagg keyboard case before and assumed that perhaps I had at fault when the first Zagg keyboard case did the same thing. With this 2nd keyboard case I was more careful (not that I was not careful the 1st time round) Despite my care the Cover/Tablet holder snapped off again.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine W.

customer_reviews.title: Zagg returned after right/left arrows quit working and wouldn't connect
customer_reviews.text: I returned this Zagg as the left and right arrow keys sometimes worked but more often didn't. Final straw was that it wouldn't power up and connect even after being charged overnight. Both my wife and I have had the black keyboard Zaggs for over three years and they still work great. Edge plastic that keyboard slides under only exists at the very bottom on my black Zagg which is why I ordered this white one to have as a backup and to take when traveling. Seems quality has taken a hit in the past three years. Will wait a few months and try again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: If you don't need all the letters in the alphabet, this is the keyboard for you
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I heard this particular keyboard case was good. After one week, the "f" key no longer worked, sometimes I get the "i" key, and now the "b" key does not work - although sometimes in the middle of a sentence a "b" will just appear. I want to return it or get it replaced by the vendor, or even upgrade, but upon talking to amazon, I was told if I kept the broken item she would refund me 50%... I asked if she could help me find a better unit, I would pay the difference and next thing I knew, she hung up. REALLY... WHAT A GREAT BIRTHDAY PRESENT THIS TURNED OUT TO BE,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy...heavy....HEAVY!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is ridiculously heavy. The name "Ultrathin" could lead someone to believe that it's also lightweight, but nothing could be further from the truth! Everything else about it works wonderfully, so I am giving it 4 stars, but the weight is a MAJOR drawback. It's fine if you're just using it at home or on a desk, but if you have to carry it around, you will start to feel it almost immediately. When attached to my iPad Pro, it is heavier than most medium sized laptops. They need to shave off at least half the weight in order to make it comfortably portable.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one when I bought my iPad 3. After 6 years or so that one developed a problem with the keys double clicking. That was a good run so I replaced it with another one. That one would not recharge so I thought it was a fluke. After all my first one lasted a long time. Then I bought a second one and now this one will barely hold a charge. I have to recharge my keyboard more often than the iPad. What a load of bologna.
customer_reviews.author: LA NINFA

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad Cover - Secure and great syncing with the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I ruined my prior Zagg Folio (spilled water), so upgraded to this. The keyboard is much easier and responsive than the prior version (purchased in 2012). It constantly maintains contact with my iPad (the prior version you would have to re-sync quite often). My only negative with this version is that it's held together (when closed) by an almost non-existent magnet. My prior version had a very heavy latch holding the two sides together (it did not come open unless you put a little effort into it). With this one, I really don't care as I leave it open in my kitchen most of the time (very seldom closed).
customer_reviews.author: Stacy R

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard Case
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son to use with his iPad, which he utilizes primarily for work. The case paired up with his iPad without any problem and he loves the keyboard feature. It's perfect for him for taking notes during meetings and doing other typing-intensive activities. The back lighting feature is particularly helpful as he enjoy sitting at night in front of the television and working on projects while watching a ball game or television show. The lit keyboard makes it much easier to do so. The iPad also fit perfectly into the case, safe and snug.
customer_reviews.author: wsk

customer_reviews.title: Love these cases!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. This is my second one and I wore the first one out after 3 years of daily use. I absolutely love the keyboard, it holds the charge for so long. That being said I do turn it off when I'm not using it. But, if you want to use a keyboard with your tablet, then I highly recommend these cases.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Severely Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product. However, I wish that I had waited and shopped around before ordering this. The adhesive gluing the inside lining to the plastic has gotten "gummy" (without water or any other damage causing it to do so), the plastic keyboard is discoloring and now has white spots and the worst thing: the top part that holds the ipad device falls over and hits whatever behind it (table/counter surface, other objects, food/drink - sometimes I work while I eat, etc.). If there is nothing behind it when it falls, it will topple to the floor and could damage your ipad.
customer_reviews.author: GapDragon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the recommendation of a friend. When it arrived, it looked all right but was not of the same quality as hers. After less than two months of use, the attachment of the cover has come undone and the slot into which the keyboard fits does not hold the iPad securely causing it to slip out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Brought life to a forgotten iPad !
customer_reviews.text: I am using this right now as I type! I tossed my IPad aside soon after buying it. After seeing a girl in class using one I had to inquire about it & get one for myself! Now I feel like I have a brand new device! I love the ability to change the color & intensity of the back-lit keyboard. I only wish there was an option for the white keys with a different color case other than all white leather as it obviously shows dirt super fast. I'm now typing with ideas to hide the dirt & finger prints on the case. No problem with the actual white keys though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CASE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CASE!!! I had ordered one directly from Zagg 3 years ago. A few months ago, the charging cord pulled out something from the interior of the keyboard. I managed to charge it once after that but was afraid it might damage the keyboard if I continued to use the defective connection. The same unit from ZAGG was about twice the price. This vendor did not offer Prime shipping, but my free shipping came in 4 days. My older keyboard was identical to this one, except it was not backlit. Although I am an old-school touch typist, the ligh comes in handy occasionally at night.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a slicker cover would be good.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint - and it's very minor - is that the case is slightly sticky. I suppose that it does keep it from sliding off your lap but it makes it very difficult to slide around on my breakfast room table. I use a small slick mail order catalog underneath it to compensate for that lack. I've also learned to turn the keyboard backlight off to preserve the longevity of the battery. Otherwise, I'm loving my new Zagg keyboard cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy product - BEWARE AMAZON WILL REFUND BUT NOT REPLACE THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for a whole 6 days at the time of writing this. The cloth connector piece between the iPad holder and the keyboard has already tore loose. This is with taking the ultimate care to not stretch it at that point. But it didn't matter. Poor craftsmanship. The keyboard continues dropping the Bluetooth connection as well. Don't buy this item, buy one that is a complete case that opens like a laptop. I guarantee you your connecting piece will rip loose too if you purchase this horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kinkaid

customer_reviews.title: This is very nice with only one exception
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice with only one exception. There is supposed to be a magnetic closure and THERE IS NOT. You have to be careful when carrying your Ipad in this case and make sure you hold it closed. That is the only reason for 4 stars otherwise it would have 5 stars. Zagg products are excellent and the company stands behind their products. Possibly it was mis-information in the ad, but all ads for this product that I have found said it has a magnetic closure. A slight inconvenience...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase. The backlit keys are excellent in various light conditions and the intensity and color can be adjusted accordingly. It is especially easy to use in low light because each button and it's letter is lit up. The keyboard pairs flawlessly with the iPad and sleeps after a period of inactivity... Then it pairs again automatically when you touch a key. The keystroke speed is instant and I like the separate convenience keys on the top row.
customer_reviews.author: Rowjo

customer_reviews.title: I love this case!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased this case initially rather than trying a series of other cases first. They keys work well- the spacing is not an issue for me. It is compact and folds nicely- protects my iPad in addition to sliding easily into my purse or bag/briefcase. Probably my only disappointment is that when I use certain programs (like Evernote, or similar programs) the arrow keys do not move the cursor- I need to either use the touch screen to manipulate the location where I want to do an insertion of some type (or if I want to delete in the middle of a page or script). Other than that, this item is a keeper for my iPad 2.
customer_reviews.author: honest to a fault

customer_reviews.title: Instant Pairing
customer_reviews.text: Usually pairs immediately. When I have problems I have to reboot my iPad. This may be because I pair the keyboard with other items. The keyboard (with iPad) has no lag and I type about 100 wpm. I can tell no difference between its responsiveness and the Apple branded mini-bluetooth keyboard, and this is far, far more portable. Would recommend it to anyone with an iPad. While the keyboard pairs well and is perfectly responsive, the case will only fit the iPad. When you shut the case, sometimes the iPad stays on, rather than sleeps--this drains the battery and makes your pack hot. This is my only con.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, holding up ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought two on these in white when they were in sale. They work great, but obviously they get dirty easily. Regular use and cleaning has the edges distressing a little after only a few months of use. I get the feeling the case will wear out faster than the electronics will. If you get it for a cheap price or you just have to have a softer case, it's worth it. Otherwise, I would look for a hard case.
customer_reviews.author: Barefoot In The Backyard

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is great. Case is decent
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is great. Case is decent. However the white case attracts dirt like crazy. YES I understand that it is white, however, I chose the white because It was in my price point and I couldn't bring myself to purchase the black one. I should've known better because now, after my first use, it is stained and even with a magic eraser the stains won't come out. Really sad and wish I could return it
customer_reviews.author: S. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I liked the keyboard but it was shipped with a faulty cable. To their credit Zagg shipped out a replacement very quickly. Unfortunately, 5 months after I received the keyboard one entire line of the keyboard stopped working. I wrote to Zagg twice and didn't receive a reply. Sorry to say I can't recommend the keyboard or Zagg as a company. Update: I have now heard from Zagg that they will be shipping a replacement unit since the fault occurred within the one-year warranty period. This is more in line with the favorable comments about Zagg customer service I've read in the comments here. I hope the unit is more reliable - it's a good, functional keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Listener

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover, Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard that does everything I need from a shell-type iPad bluetooth case/keyboard. It is easily turned on and off with a switch at the top right of it (with the keyboard in typing position), the case automatically shuts off the iPad if it touches the magnets within the iPad (Smart-Cover-esque) and it is a very "solid" feeling case. I feel like I could drop it from my height and it would still be perfectly fine. This is a great keyboard, it feels great, looks pretty good (outside is a little harder plastic than what I think is good), and overall, is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best keyboard and case out there for a Ipad
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best keyboard and case out there for a Ipad. I spent the past two weeks frantically trying to quickly replace my old ZAGG keyboard (it was 4 years old). I purchased three different ones, each was a miserable failure for some reason or another. Nothing compares to a ZAGG. I love the hard case, the ease of which it can be used, the spacing and size of keys. It is sturdy and has some heft. It is very easy to use. It is as secure sitting on your lap as it is on a table top.
customer_reviews.author: melspark2012

customer_reviews.title: Do i need a back lit keyboard?  No, but i like it.
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Great design Light Love the backlit keys Easy to use Sturdy Bluetooth lag is very minimal. The Bad Does not stay closed. I wish there was some kind of magnet or clasp that would keep it closed. I would easily recommend this to anybody looking to buy. Not staying closed is not that big of a deal, but did warrant dropping a star off of the review. The keys feel like a real keyboard and have the same layout as a real keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: NathanG

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard just wish the tray was deeper my ipad ...
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard just wish the tray was deeper my ipad tips easily out if I am not careful. It definitely is manageable....That is my only complaint everything else about it is great. Easy to charge, type and use overall.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, except for big, fat AT&T logo!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint about this product is that the exterior is not plain black. The back has a big, fat AT&T logo right in the middle of it (see photo)! I'm *really* no big fan of AT&T, AND I don't do 3rd-party advertising for free. So I either have to burn 20 minutes to remove the logo, or cover it up somehow... Other than that, everything works nicely, fits, etc., etc. ZAGG, if you're reading this, a $5 credit would cover my time & effort, and I would change this to 5*.
customer_reviews.author: y.naught

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Received when my first choice went away. The glue holding the exterior surface to the halves and hinge separated and caused irritation with loose edges, then hinge failure. I would not buy one, but it does have a great keyboard with long battery life and good blue tooth signal.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: As good as they can get
customer_reviews.text: Good keyboard case. There is a lag between input and actually seeing the keys on the screen but that is expected of any bluetooth keyboard. There were some shortcuts and abilities I wish it hadsuch as swiping to unlock and others but I do not know how feasible this is on the software side of the production. I returned it mostly due to incorrect information that was on the listing when I bought it that stated it has backlit keys when it really doesnt. otherwise, I would recommend this keyboard for general recreational use.
customer_reviews.author: GeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Quite good but limited viewing angle options, some stickiness initially
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd ZAGG keyboard- I wore the first one out in 2 years (no complaint- it was a constant companion). This model offers a slightly more limited number of viewing angles, so is a bit uncomfortable anywhere but on a table. Also having some minor problems with getting the keyboard backlighting to shut off automatically- haven't figured that out yet. Also, both I and someone I met while traveling commented on the keys producing repeat letters (like thisssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss) for the first couple weeks of use. It seems to go away after a week or so of regular use. So a very good product, but some changes from earlier models make it somewhat less than perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Space Bar Breaks
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case - it's easy, all the keyboard functions are there and it looks nice. Trouble is, the space bar gets stuck. It's like something is stuck under the space bar so you can't press it down. I've ordered 2 of these products and the first time, I assumed it was something I did - dropped it or got something stuck under the space key. There's no way to take it apart to look into it further, so I just ordered another one. Well, after a couple months of use, the space key got stuck on this one too. It's pretty useless without the space bar, especially for someone who's using it to write fiction. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: FunWithFreckles

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second keyboard we bought for this iPad, and it so far out-performs the previous keyboard that we will never be without one like this again. The keys are backlit, and the letters can never rub off like they do in cheaper brands. The cover protects the screen, which we found out was important when we shattered it last year and had to replace it. The back stand is sturdy, unlike the cheaper brand where the back stand broke off after a couple of months, and we had to put a lego block in the back to support it. I personally like the way the keys are better spaced out for my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kenninghouse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Best keyboard case I've used yet. Fits my iPad 4 perfectly, with no slipping. The backlit feature is particularly nice for me, since I prefer to work outside whenever possible, even late into the evening. Also in its favor, I haven't managed to drain the battery yet-and not for lack of trying. This definitely isn't the case for your needs if you're looking for heavy duty protection for your device, or if you regularly use the portrait rather than landscape position (I pretty much never do with the iPads). Otherwise, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: mavenmags

customer_reviews.title: Between Belkin QODE and ZAGG PROfolio
customer_reviews.text: I had read a lot of bad reviews about the Profolio+ so was hesitant to try it. I bought the Belkin QODE, but the stability of working on my lap was not great and wasn't crazy the aluminum side of the case. The feel of the keyboard was hard to get used. After a week I decided to order th PROfolio+ and compared. LOVE IT. The keyboard works well and is easier to type on, for me. The stability is great on my lap or anywhere else. The outer covering is nice and is easy to carry without slipping, like the aluminum. My co-worker is using the QODE and loves it, so it is probably a matter of personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Nirak

customer_reviews.title: Great value and utility
customer_reviews.text: First, let me state, that I purchased this keyboard to replace a high-dollar keyboard...that cracked with use after a year (normal treatment, not dropped). This keyboard is roughly half the price of the other unit, is lighter, and features backlit keys (much handier than you might imagine). I am very pleased with the keyboard overall. It is rather irritatingly hard to discern the correct orientation to open the keyboard (I guess that's a user problem). Additionally, I wish that the keyboard would fold backwards, facilitating using the unit when using in tablet oriientation.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Uke

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: This one was a very poor relative to the one it replaced. It flops all over the place and doesn't hold up. I waited this long to review because it usually doesn't do much good to do it. The $54. Was a waste of money that I couldn't afford.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Boo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Short Lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: The Zagg PROfolio + has been useful; it has protected my iPad from the occasional spilled coffee and the rare drop. It allows the iPad to be propped at a useful angle, with an easy-to-sync keyboard, converting it to a mini-Mac. But now, the PROfolio is coming apart, just 15 months old. The flexible spine that spans the keyboard bottom and the protective top is shredding. I can say honestly the product was used as intended, and never abused, but the flexible part is shredding. The iPad can't be properly supported or protected.
customer_reviews.author: Prof.  Anton

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard but the BATTERY LIFE IS LOUSY!
customer_reviews.text: My previous Zagg keyboard (that I dropped on the street), had 10 times the battery life of this new one. What a pain in the #*$... This is really a shame since I love the action of this keyboard, and the sleek new case opens much easier than my previous Zagg keyboard (purchased about 18 months ago). Backlighted keyboard was also a good idea. What's up Zagg? I used to charge up my keyboard twice a year (and I used it every day), now I have to charge it up every month.
customer_reviews.author: nacnud

customer_reviews.title: This is new?
customer_reviews.text: Product received in a box which had been previously opened with the charging cord missing. Fortunately, I had a cord which fit but I am most disappointed in the quality of the packaging and obvious quality control. After I charged the keyboard it paired up and seems to work well. The only other comment is the design of the cover. I purchased this as a replacement for a previous Zagg keyboard and case with an aluminum faced keyboard. The previous cover has a latch integral in the design of the cover, which made it very secure. The new case has no latch...so there is going to be more potential to have it come open while carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PURCHASE THE WHITE CASE, GET BLACK, AMAZING KEYBOARD THOUGH.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is awesome, but the protective covering (leather) in white is so bad. I literally coated it with protective spray and it is impossible to keep it clean. I would recommend the backlit keyboard in BLACK, but it was the worst idea to get white. I am upset that they wouldn't provide with a good outside casing. I had to laminate the entire case with a plastic sticky covering, but unfortunately I feel it was already ruined and I had it less than 1 week. Unless you plan on having this in a clean room and with latex gloves, expect it to get REALLY dirty and without easy cleaning.,
customer_reviews.author: Susi

customer_reviews.title: It's like having a tiny Macbook!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this so I could have a portable computer that I could bring to school (I'm a teacher) as free computers are often hard to come by. I had a different keyboard that was fine, but the keys were placed differently than on a regular keyboard. This is perfect! It paired immediately with my iPad and it works just like a regular computer keyboard. It won't replace my Macbook pro for serious typing and lesson planning, but to be able to work just about anywhere in school is a wonderful thing! I got mine on Amazon and I think it was sold as used, but it's like new and works perfectly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Blaisep

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard, nice feel, small, hardcase.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these to be used with a pair of iPad Air tablets in a small medical office. These devices were to be used by the doctor and nurses in the exam rooms to enter their electronic records. After two months, one unit refused to charge and eventually wouldn't start. The Zagg replacement policy is GREAT and we had no problem getting a replacement sent out to us. My only other complaint is that the keyboard/iPad combo doesn't lay flat in the open position. i.e. it doesn't lay flat with the screen facing up. Overall, we're happy with the keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Ipad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems ok but I didn't get to use the case as unfortunately I ordered the wrong one. I have the ipad air 2 and mistakenly thought this would fit the bill. There is a zagg case for the ipad air 2 and I'll report back when it's delivered and I've had chance to use it! If you are looking for a Zagg case for your Ipad Air 2, here's the link
customer_reviews.author: LittleBirdie

customer_reviews.title: This my friends is the best of the Zagg keyboard cases
customer_reviews.text: This my friends is the best of the Zagg keyboard cases. I went through 2 OTTER BOX heavy duty cases in these last 2 years due to rubber skrinkage and plastic cover cracking. Im done with "Otter".This case fits the 2-3-4 models of Ipad. Do not think that the Ipad 4 case speaker cutout is misplaced as I did, the sound from the speaker is only enhanced with the opposed cutout. This is a superb case and once registered is guaranteed for life. No issue,Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Bates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Companion
customer_reviews.text: Purchased upon recommendation by friend who has been using the same Zagg product for over a year. Theirs was purchased directly from Zagg for $130. I searched the internet and of course, Amazon does it again, for less! Saved $54 dollars for the same model! Fits the iPads listed. Easy to set up and use. Holds iPad at the correct angle, reducing glare. Backlit keyboard is real plus. The keyboard mimics MAC keyboards, so everything is familiar. When folded together, the Zagg makes for a really nice package that easy to hold. Not included in with this item from Zagg, but with the Zagg cover on the iPad will still will fit in the V7 sleeve with handles.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Great product and works as a protective cover for your IPad.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Zagg keyboard. This is my replacement for my original Zagg which lasted two years before crashing. It gives me the ability to use my IPad as a computer, without having to carry my computer around. I can take notes, send e-mails, write FB posts, etc. quickly. Of course, I';m a good touch typist so it is perfect for me. The other thing I love is that it is also a protective case for the IPad. I just wish they would make them in colors again. My last was hot pink and easy to find in a pile of stuff on my counter. :-)
customer_reviews.author: J Loves Mysteries

customer_reviews.title: The case did not last for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 months of use the case started falling apart. It is not worth the price I paid for it. Very poor quality..
customer_reviews.author: rpg25

customer_reviews.title: Good For SomeThings / Others Not So Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this I-Pad case but it has it's flaws. It would be nice if the case allowed you to spin the screen around and use it in a vertical position. This makes it clumsy when using app's that do not migrate to the wide screen position. The case also does not allow you fold it over and lay flat. With that said, this case and keyboard make text messaging and e-mailing a snap. Simple solution, have both types of cases to use as you deem suitable for the tasks you want to perform at that time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hunn

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a new case when my last case fell apart, I had used it every day for 5 years while in college and then afterward for research. I am glad I was able to purchase this one for a good price. It is simple to sync and the keyboard is comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: hortoncrew

customer_reviews.title: Zagg excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service from Zagg. I liked the keyboard but it didn't work. It would not pair with my IPad. I called Zagg and they offered to send me a new one, (a different model: universal keyboard which is slightly bigger which Zagg sells for 79.99 ) at no extra cost and they paid for shipping the old one back to them. So even though the keyboard didn't work, I am giving Zagg a 5
customer_reviews.author: newtonian007

customer_reviews.title: My second - almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard. Slide in your iPad and you are good to go. Syncs easily - battery lasts for more than a month (I've never run it down). Easy to prop up the iPad, and looks professional. All options are easily reached. Only one quibble, and I've seen this with other cases that use bluetooth, there is an annoying tendency to have "key repeat" stuck where you hit a key once and get 4 or 5 or more repeats. Weird, it's random. Turning the keyboard off and on seems to help. Overall, though, great product.
customer_reviews.author: firewallbillTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Affordable, and Great Addition to iPad Experience
customer_reviews.text: This is my third ZAGG keyboard and second of this specific case. Other than the outer lining wearing out a bit after two years, my original case is still in great working order. The only reason I bought a second case is that I dropped something on the keyboard a few months ago and wanted to get a back up for if and when this one goes. The Zagg PROfolio+ is a great addition to the iPad experience and makes for a great alternative to using my laptop for e-mails and short messages.
customer_reviews.author: ARTandon

customer_reviews.title: Good case but not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my daughter's school-issued iPad. It is a nice case with the cool added feature of an attached keyboard. Unfortunately, it did not stand up to her fairly rough daily usage. The case exterior stayed white for only about a week and all of the keys came off of the keyboard. However, it did protect her iPad from damage which was what I primarily cared about. I'm giving this case four stars because it did succeed in its efforts to protect my daughter's iPad and because I think it would have held up better for someone more conscientious about taking care of his/her iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Zagg PROfolio highest quality outshines others
customer_reviews.text: Excellent easy to use keyboard and nice backlight perfect protector for your electronic device. I highly recommend this Zagg PROfolio as the quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby19

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best keyboard /protective case I have seen. Sturdy, well protected,good looking. The only thing is I keep hitting the "lock" button in the upper right of keyboard right above the delete key. That's a tad annoying because I have to then unlock the screen and pick up where I left off. Both of my HS kids and I now have this. They bring their iPads to school daily and have for over a year. All homework is done on the iPad. Not one complaint or issue with this case or keyboard. One of my "users" is a teenage boy, too!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cashin

customer_reviews.title: great portable keyboard/case for iPad 3
customer_reviews.text: fabulous keyboard typing on any hard surface like a desk or floor...not great for typing in bed or on your lap at an odd angle as iPad falls out of its slot and can be a bit frustrating...but love the natural keyboard and illumination...i can type almost as well as on my regular keyboard...i've been on the same charge now since i bought it a month ago and still lights up green...highly recommend and am a fan of all of Zagg's products and quality the put into things!
customer_reviews.author: J. Elizabeth Dousson

customer_reviews.title: A truly annoying product!
customer_reviews.text: 3 things I dislike about this: 1. The slot that holds the iPad upright is too loose and so the iPad is constantly slipping out of it. Not good when you're in the middle of typing. 2. The plastic lining on the back started peeling off after a couple months and leaves a residue of dried glue particles all over the keyboard. 3. There is no light to indicate when the Caps Lock is on or off. 4. There is no way to tell when the battery is running low or whether it is fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: fred reuland

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, but plan on replacing every 18 months!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT keyboard and generally durable case. BUT, a design flaw means that it needs to be replaced roughly every 18 months -- which is ridiculous for a $100 keyboard!! I'm on my third in four years. Here's the problem: the bases has two sections: they lightweight keyboard section and the heavier battery section. Eventually -- roughly every 18 months -- the base unit starts bowing at where the battery and keyboard sections meets. The iPad starts flipping out at the least movement -- EG: while holding the iPAD for presentations or with mild turbulence while flying. Amazon Contact Us was unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for an iPad. It's the second one I've had. The iPad begins to fall out of the slot it fits into after some usage. Sometimes the Bluetooth stops connecting. The keyboard is not a good configuration for me. I keep hitting cap lock instead of shift key. I will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: Good locking case, holds the ipad securely and the keyboard is great. When it connects that is. I have to mess around often to get the ipad to recognize this case and get it to pair. Plus the battery life on this is abysmal so I am constantly charging it. Much more so than the ipad itself.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. The lighted keyboard is great (even though ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. The lighted keyboard is great (even though it has a bit of spill over), connection to my iPad3 is easy as pie, not bulky at all. The battery life is excellent and easy to check, my case is not peeling off - as I've heard others experiencing) in fact I think it is very well made. I really appreciate the tiny directional audio speaker port. It directs the sound towards the user. And the quality and feel of the keyboard is excellent and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Osaka

customer_reviews.title: Very good case
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little case. This fits my iPad perfectly. Is very easy to type on. Very quiet to type on. It's perfect for a student in a class. The backlit keyboard with multiple colors is also a huge Plus. Other reviews that say that the lining wI'll tear away in my opinion is not exactly accurate. It will show wear and tear so treat it nicely
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P.

customer_reviews.title: Great at full price, even better at off price
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I got this open-box keyboard case for half price - it was, as represented, "like new." I bought this to replace the one I'd used for 2 years constantly - like every day, all over the world, stuffed in a backpack or in my laptop bag. After 2 years, the leatherette began to peel a bit, so I treated myself to a replacement. This is the best keyboard for the iPad 2-3-4.
customer_reviews.author: Medical Marketing Maven

customer_reviews.title: I really should know better than to buy something in WHITE that gets as ...
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetics: 5 star with a sharp decline after a couple of days! At 49 years old, I really should know better than to buy something in WHITE that gets as much use as my Ipad. It looked really sharp the first day, or two. Since then, if I don't clean it frequently, it looks pretty grubby. If you only use your Ipad indoors and don't schlep it EVERYWHERE with you, then this will continue to look very stylish. For my lifestyle, however, I should have stuck with black. Functionally, this is a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cosley

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has been amazing. I have used it pretty regularly since I purchased it and I don't really have too many complaints. It's comfortable to use for both your fingers and wrists. I love that it lights up so I ca use it in dim light as well. It also allows the tablet to sit at a good viewing angle. My only complaint is that it is a little heavy, but really good quality. it is by far one of the best keyboards I have used with a tablet so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much for perfection
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed with my lovely case. Something has happened and now the case will not stay in place on its designated recepctable in the case. Throughout the entire I am trying to use it the screen falls over backwards and ends up on the ground. It is such a disappointment because I loved this case and keyboard so much. Now I will be in search for another! It was as much as perfect as it could have been...
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Bear

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Perfect keyboard/cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the best case/keyboard I have ever purchased. It has a rubbery feel to it! The keyboard is awesome and I am very picky. Thanks to a great seller I hope you sell rubberized cell phone covers too, as I would definitely buy from you again!
customer_reviews.author: SophieTheo

customer_reviews.title: This was the best Bluetooth case with a keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This was the best Bluetooth case with a keyboard!! The hard case keeps it protected in case you drop it. The bluetooth keeps connected and the charge lasts a long time. It's so nice to be able to type on my iPad too. I have another brand for my newer iPad now, and it is a pain. You have to pull the top out and get it situated. With this one, you just open it up and get it propped up in its spot and it's ready to go!! Eventually I will get another one for my new iPad because this one is just superior to the one I'm currently using
customer_reviews.author: Lori B

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to replace an older model; appeared to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older model; appeared to be the same except for the backlit keys. It's not! The old one had a snap latch that both held the cover shut and served as a "thumb-hold" to open the case with one hand. This new one lacks any way to hold it closed. Probably should steer clear. Although the old one lasted several years, it did so with a piece of each of the iPad retention ridges broken (cheap). I've returned mine
customer_reviews.author: Walter A. Sanna

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful and useful
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful and useful when chatting on social media apps, writing documents and etc.
customer_reviews.author: Abdifatah

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard with drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: I love my keyboard and the case protects the iPad too. I had one for about 2 years that quit working. I replaced it with the exact same thing because it works so well. Follow up, I have had my keyboard for 6 months. I have had to glue the metal back onto the keyboard twice now. It would be great if it weren't so slick on the outside. It has fallen many times. I would prefer a rubbery grip type case.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...for less than ONE month
customer_reviews.text: I've been using another less expensive keyboard/case for about a year. It worked OK, but after it died because the space key stopped working after about a year, I decided to try this...based on reviews here. The Zagg is well made and the keys look and feel good. The case is sturdy and functionally attractive. I like the ability to backlight the keys. it worked flawlessly for 30 days and then died. I think the on/off switch is the problem, but ??? Seems silly to also have to pay shipping for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bozarth

customer_reviews.title: Over Rated
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered thousands of dollars worth of products from amazon.com and in most cases I have been well pleased. Amazon by far is the best place to shop. However, this product is overrated. The quality of leather and durability is flimsy and the edges of the iPad case are crumbling a part. I am disappointed to say the least, and even more disappointed when I lose money to ship things back. If it were between $20-$30 I would consider keeping it, but definitely not worth $80. Not I pressed with ZAGG at this point...I like quality.
customer_reviews.author: FBW

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful product. Wish Zagg made one for the 5th ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful product. Wish Zagg made one for the 5th generation IPad. I ordered this one because I previously had a zagg profolio and love it. Unfortunately these do not fit the newest IPad. I realize I made the mistake, but would encourage Zagg to step up their game. I have had to order another brand, which I am not sure of.. thank you Amazon for carrying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Faust

customer_reviews.title: Great for those of us mired in a history of touch typing on a keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is about as good as it gets for an ipad. Love the lighted keys, and the power saving feature, along with the ease to bluetooth connect to the ipad and access the on/off button is handy. I recommended it to coworkers who liked it after purchase. The only downside is sometimes the space key is ticky and you have to be a bit more deliberate in firmness of touch. the added functionality of the top row of keys is a bonus although I will admit I mosstly use the "return to home" button most.
customer_reviews.author: Janice S. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Zagg - profit over quality.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very poorly made. My wife and I both purchased one for our iPads. Both units failed after 5 months. This is the 2nd time I have purchased from Zagg and the quality has gone down. Both units failed in the same way that the keyboard would no longer tilt back. While the warranty might cover this I would not purchase from them again. I feel it's a company that is sacrificing quality on the alter of their brand. Typical corporation that does not stay true to their commitment.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard case but has some issues.
customer_reviews.text: It took 3 tries to get one that didn't have issues with it, but I'm glad I tried a 3 rd time. It's the best keyboard case combo I have used so far. The lighted keyboard is the only way to go, since I can use it in a dark room with the keyboard as the only light. The reason I rated it so low is because of the 3 tries and the cover is leather which is nice when you first get it, but it scratches so easily, which I have learned to live with, because I really like the keyboard case itself. I think a faux leather would almost be a better material to go with.
customer_reviews.author: Rolanda Lehn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hook up and it works
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this keyboard to write my review and I love it. Very easy to type fast on, and just as easy to hook up to your iPad. It all folds into a case that makes traveling easy. I now take my iPad instead of my computer when I travel. It takes the same plug in as my Kindle so I always have a charger for it. So far so good. I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Landry

customer_reviews.title: Zagg Keyboard Transforms iPad Experience
customer_reviews.text: The Zagg keyboard has transformed my iPad use. Now I have the use of keyboard shortcuts similar to what I have in Windows (yeah!) and arrow keys to navigate the way I can with my Android keyboard. Makes me wonder why Apple doesn't have such things available in the on-screen keyboard, of course--but very happy with the Zagg Bluetooth keyboard. The connection setup is incredibly simple, and just opening the case turns the iPad on, ready to go. My only suggestion for Zagg is that it would be nice if there were a little slot somewhere in the cover for a business card, to help anyone who might find a misplaced device return it to its sad owner.
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: Great Case Especially if you Want an External Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I love tha abiity to change colors on the backlit keyboard. The touch on the keyboard is quiet and the feel is great. The outside of the case has a leather feel and totally protects your device. The angle is perfect and allows the device to stay put in that position. The only thing I can say negative is that the speaker on the 4th generation iPad is covered up by the case design. It does cut down on the sound if you are not using headphones. This however, is not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: pm novice

customer_reviews.title: Consider this before you purchase - short comment.
customer_reviews.text: Description claims a magnetic closing mechanism which it does NOT have. There was nothing to keep the case cover closed. Consider the physics: If your iPad is lying flat with the cover closed but the case has no way to secure the cover and, for any reason it drops, the air catches the cover forcing it open as it falls and your iPad glass face hits the floor making direct contact. What sense does it make to manufacture a protective casing that does not have a secure closing mechanism?
customer_reviews.author: Perry Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses her iPad at school and complained about having to use the on screen keyboard. I purchased this and she loves it. Her IPad sits like a little laptop on the keyboard, and it backlit. When closed the case forms a nice case/cover for the iPad. One issue we did have however, was that the keyboard lost the bluetooth signal, and we had to 'forget' the bluetooth settings and then turn the iPad on and off and reconnect the bluetooth before it would work again. Otherwise, good keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleReviewsItAll

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints Here!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard for an iPad! I find it comfortable to type on (keys are a bit small, but easy to get used to), and it functions well with good battery life. I use my iPad with this case in place of my MacBook when traveling, and it is a great substitute. The case does make the iPad rather heavy, but this one is good quality and has lasted me 6 months so far!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and Returned for Refund
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Brown Leather version of this case for my iPad 4. It arrived quickly via Prime. However, once I opened it, I encountered two major issues. First, the item I received had either been used or a previous return as the plastic inside the box was torn open already. Also, the case itself already had a few small scuffs and a crease, telling me someone had already used this item. Additionally, this item is plastic..NOT brown leather. The keyboard seems very nice, but the outer case is a very flimsy plastic and will offer little protection of your iPad in my opinion. I'll look elsewhere for a more protective and functional case.
customer_reviews.author: M. Will

customer_reviews.title: Great, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product as a combo keyboard & cover. It seems pretty expensive, but the level of functionality and ease that it has provided me is well worth it. I use my iPad as a business machine, with lots of typing of emails, Word docs and such, and this increases my speed and productivity mightily. I especially like the backlighting and iPad-specific buttons tha keep you from having to touch the screen for certain functions.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: This was great until it mysteriously stopped working after only 3 months of use. Easy to set up, not too heavy, good keyboard feel, and held the charge for quite a while. Last week it just stopped working. It won't turn on and doesn't seem to take a charge--I tried twice from two different outlets using my iPad plug. It has never been dropped or abused in any way. Very disappointing! (I'm hoping it can be replaced under warranty.)
customer_reviews.author: Ellee27

customer_reviews.title: Zagg happily replaced the product for me and waived shipping and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Zagg Profolio has turned my iPad into a convenient small laptop which I have with me all the time. My first Zagg Profolio had some issues pairing with my iPad and holding a charge. After trouble-shooting it over the phone, Zagg happily replaced the product for me and waived shipping and handling in addition. I'm happy to report the new Profolio has been performing like a workhorse! Great service and a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: miggiemagpie

customer_reviews.title: I disliked this case
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this case. It was bulky, did not fit the iPad properly, even though it said it would fit. The iPad slid out of the case every time I opened and tried to set it up. I wouldn’t recommend it unless you have an iPad 9.7 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Meatball

customer_reviews.title: It's really light and thing and I especially love how there are special keys on their keyboard specific ...
customer_reviews.text: It's really light and thing and I especially love how there are special keys on their keyboard specific to the iPad, such as a home key and a lock key. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because the keyboard does not fold back all the way, so if you want to use the iPad without the keyboard you have to take it out of the case completely. However, it is really easy to slip out the iPad and slip it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Panetta

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: It connects quickly and easily and works perfectly up until the last moment the battery dies. I can type 60+ words per minute on a good keyboard and although I haven't time tested myself on this, I feel like I am productive and getting my keyboarding needs done accurately and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: scrapbookingmom

customer_reviews.title: Best Zagg keyboard yet
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Zagg keyboard and case. The first one had a great keyboard, but the case came 'free' with the keyboard and fell apart (I think I left it in my car trunk too long, and the heat melted the glue on the case). The new keyboard is even better (the first one was a bit noisy and clicked a bit when I typed), lights up which is a nice feature, and the case is better constructed. The only thing I miss about my first Zagg case is that it came in colors, and black was the only choice with the PROfolio.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sue Lynn

customer_reviews.title: No magnets?  Does not stay shut!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is nice, and the case is lightweight, but NOTHING keeps the pad closed. Both the description and the box say "powerful magnets keep your case securely closed" but there are NO magnets. The case only stays closed if laying flat, but nothing holds it together if not. I had a ZAGG keyboard prior to this one that DID stay shut, but this one does not. Not sure why it says it is magnetic?
customer_reviews.author: K. Zielinski

customer_reviews.title: Very good keyboard and protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific case and keyboard for my iPad. Even though the keyboard is smaller than I'm used to, it's very easy to adapt to, and the feel of the keys is excellent. It folds up easily and when open, It's very stable when upright as the screen fits in a groove. The only drawback, which I knew before buying it, is that the screen can't be rotated to the vertical position. In my book that capability would give it five stars
customer_reviews.author: QueenZ

customer_reviews.title: New Life
customer_reviews.text: This has breathed new life into how I can utilize my iPad. I really have enjoyed this keyboard / case as it has made using my iPad much more user friendly. Two complaints, it doesn't stay connected to blue tooth at all times, so even though I haven't turned anything off, it sometimes disconnects from my iPad and I have to turn off and on my iPads bluetooth. The other is sometimes the keys can be a little loose. Over all, I would absolutely recommend. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't had this item for a week and lost a key on it. It's bulky, clumsy, and hard to use at times. Frankly, if I hadn't spent so much money on it, I would discard it and purchase an otter box. But now that I have purchased it, I just feel like I need to get some use out of it. I should have sent it back, because I don't think I'll ever be satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Traveller
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great with my iPad as I traveled. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Product was great while it lasted. It is simple, very easy to use. I purchased it to use on work trips and meetings. The battery died about a year after purchase and after looking it up online, it turns out this is a problem across the board with Zagg products. Easy fix, though. Needed to buy a $5 battery online and re-solder it on to the keyboard. If you don't mind doing that, this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard that adds little to thickness AND it's responsive
customer_reviews.text: I love this version of the Zagg keyboard series. Easy to use and I like the texture of the case vs. he red one I purchased previously. It's very quick to charge. The keyboard is very responsive and it's easy to pair to the iPad settings. I've had this for about a week and I can't wait to take it with me when I travel instead of lugging my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa SS

product_meta.title: ZAGG PROfolio+ Ultrathin Case with Backlit Bluetooth Keyboard for iPad 2/3/4-Black
product_meta.description:
Style:PROfolio+| Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard Packaging

ZAGGKEYS PROFOLIO+ KEYBOARD CASE COVER FOR IPAD 2/3/4 
Super thin and light design allows you to take the ZAGG PROfolio+ anywhere.View larger ENJOY FAST, COMFORTABLE TYPING EVERYWHERE YOU TAKE YOUR WORK AND PLAY
The ZAGG PROfolio+ offers a complete mobile experience for your iPad. Built for travel, it features an ultrathin, lightweight design with patented keyboard technology. The PROfolio+ features backlit keys with seven interchangeable colors that can be adjusted for brightness and power management. Island-style keys provide maximum spacing in a compact Bluetooth keyboard for an authentic, relaxed feel. The ZAGG PROfolio+ closes tightly to protect your iPad against scratches, dings, and dents, and keeps it looking great. Cleverly placed magnets activate the iPad’s sleep/wake function to help preserve battery life while you're on the go.

THIN AND LIGHT
At only 0.82 inches when closed, and weighing a mere 16 ounces, the ZAGG PROfolio+ is easy to slip in a briefcase or purse and take with you. It’s so small you’ll hardly know it’s there until you begin enjoying its awesome typing experience.

THE INDUSTRY STANDARD FOR TABLET KEYBOARDS
ZAGG is the industry standard in wireless Bluetooth keyboards. They deliver innovations that are your best fit for your mobile life.


View larger BIG AND BRIGHT
Spacious, island-style keys maximize space so you can type faster and more accurately, just like a traditional laptop. Bright, backlit keys, that are available in seven interchangeable colors, make typing in low-light environments a breeze.

View larger THE TRAVELER’S DELIGHT
Specific shortcut keys operate essential functions from the convenience of your keyboard while a leather-textured cover ensures your iPad will stay safe on all your travels. A powerful magnetic closure secures your iPad to the PROfolio+ so it's well protected on the go.

View larger LONG LASTING BATTERY
The PROfolio+ Bluetooth keyboard uses a rechargeable lithium polymer battery which will last several months of regular use between charges. Regular use is estimated at two hours a day. Using the backlit feature will impact battery life and may require more frequent charging.

View larger WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Package includes one PROfolio+ keyboard, one USB to micro USB charging cable, and a user’s manual.
